description: >-
    Quick links to faucets on Telo
title: "Faucets"
---

## [EVM Testnet Faucet](https://app.telos.net/testnet/developers?tab=tlos-evm)

Testnet faucet built by the Telos Core Developers. Offers testnet $TLOS on Telos EVM and Telos Zero. 

:::note

Limited to once per 24 hours

:::

## [EVM Mainnet Faucet](https://stakely.io/en/faucet/telos-evm-tlos)

This is a faucet for a small amount of $TLOS mainnet tokens offered by stakely.io.

:::note

Will require you to complete social media tasks

:::
